name: Computational Archaeology and Neolithic Subsistence Economies
body:
I am a post-doctoral researcher at Arizona State University, studying the long term effects of human landuse decisions, especially those associated with Neolithic farming and pastoralism. As a fun way for you to quickly get a grasp of the types of things I research, I created this wordcloud from the text of my recent publications:
![Wordcloud for Isaac's research](http://isaacullah.github.io/total_wordcloud.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
